title: Isto É Bom
content:
"Isto É Bom" ("This Is Good") is a lundu written by Xisto Bahia and released by singer Baiano in 1902, through Casa Edison, labeled as Zonophone.[2] This song is considered by many Brazilian music specialists as the first recorded song in Brazil.[1][3]

This article about Brazilian music is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
